songs: Wake Up Whispering by Ben Kweller
lyrics:
Wake up whispering
But don't wake your mom and dad
Keep the morning quiet
Tip toe past the cat
Can you be sweet
And speak softly
Can you keep a secret
Promise
Hold hands whispering
You're such a good friend
Do you know the mystery
That's going on inside our heads?
Can you be still
And hold your breath
Put a mask on
Just like a tall tree
Now night time you whisper
It's such a good time for dreams
The moon and stars and everything
All planning there skins
